title: #189: Ramona's a New Old Woman! Plus: Pimp Furs
description:
Ben Mandelker (Banter Blender) and Ronnie Karam (TrashTalkTV) are back to giggle their way through another long ass episode. Real Housewives of New York is on the menu, and of course, a loving tribute to mark the end of Southern Charm?s season. Come on in!
Subscribe at www.patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens for bonus episodes, ringtones, and live group video chat parties.

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
